categories: Category:Songs by Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids

nodes.text: If You're a Biped, I Can Make U Limp

"If You're a Biped, I Can Make U Limp" was a song authored and performed by the band Boba Fett and the Assassin Droids. The track was an example of the Core Drive genre, and it was released as a single in the period of time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY.

"If You're a Biped, I Can Make U Limp" was mentioned in the 1993 book Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann. The book was a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
